issue.title: no *.sys.ini for monitor in crowdin
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

There is no *.sys.ini for monitor in crowdin

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

en_GB.com_easysdi_monitor.sys.ini file has been added inside localization platform. Ending translation is now open...

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Marc,

Could you please verify that Continuous Integration Platform has mapped this new file ?

Thanks

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

*.sys.ini file about MONITOR Joomla extension is available into easySDI deployment package
